snippet: A century ago, Tom Loggia’s great-granduncle tried to find a family cemetery in Fort Totten. Mr. Loggia has taken up the search.
abstract: Tom Loggia is searching for family ancestral burial grounds that he believes are on the site of what is now Fort Totten Park in Queens; quest is a continuance of search begun more than a century ago by family members who have steadfastly insisted that a cemetery lies unmarked on the land.
lead_paragraph: A century ago, Tom Loggia’s great-granduncle tried to find a family cemetery in Fort Totten. Mr. Loggia has taken up the search.

headline.seo: Man’s Quest Is to Find Ancestral Graveyard in Fort Totten
headline.main: Until an Ancestral Graveyard Is Found, No Time to Rest
headline.print_headline: Until an Ancestral Graveyard Is Found, No Time to Rest
